ingredients.ingredient: 1 celeriac (celery root), peeled and cut into 1/2-inch pieces
3 potatoes, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch pieces

cookingTips: Cut celeriac and potatoes to equal size so they cook evenly
Boil together until very tender (about 15-20 minutes), then drain well
Warm cream and butter before folding in to prevent mash from cooling and becoming gluey
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How do I get a smooth, creamy mash with celeriac without it becoming gluey or bitter?
